item.title: LV-Data v3.8.0.2
item.description:
Product: LV-Data v3.8.0.2
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 03 Oct 2024 16:32:12 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Collection of VIs to write and read TDMS, Igor Text Files (*.itx), text-based spreadsheet data files (*.dat), postgreSQL. Tools are also provided for uploading to and downloading from AWS S3.

Release Notes: [3.8.0]
Updates related to LV-Data.PGSQL [PostgreSQL]
- pq-labview updated to v0.4 (libpq.dll is now v17 and 32 or 64 bit compatible)
- Issue #115: Added support for creating JSON columns (jsonb)
- Issue #116: Executing any sql statement begins and ends a transaction
- Issue #117: Better support for "timestamp with timezone" datatypes ("timestamptz")
- "timestamptz" is default for new tables
- "timestamp" is backwards compatible for reading and writing if a table hasn't yet been converted to "timestamptz"
- Improved "multirow" insert (Inserts at multiple timestamps). Both "INSERT.vi" and "INSERT Multivalue.vi" support inserting into columns in different tables in one transaction.
- other bugfixes and code refactoring
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: JSON-RPC v1.2.2.7
item.description:
Product: JSON-RPC v1.2.2.7
Company: LevyLab

Description: Library for encoding and decoding JSON-RPC 2.0 request and response objects

https://www.jsonrpc.org/specification

Release Notes: [1.2.2]
- Issue #112: Adjust icon sizes to 32x24
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Xeryon-Rotator v1.0.4.7
item.description:
Product: Xeryon-Rotator v1.0.4.7
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Mon, 29 Jul 2024 17:47:26 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: instrument framework smo for controlling xeryon rotation stage. initializes communication, monitors rotator status, logs status, and exposed api to for other labview vis to set and get the angle

Release Notes: Issue #4 and #5: UI improvements
item.dc:creator: Levylab

Description: instrument framework smo for controlling xeryon rotation stage. initializes communication, monitors rotator status, logs status, and exposed api to for other labview vis to set and get the angle

Release Notes: Issue #3
- fix shortcut name
- change installation directory for configuration settins to %ProgramData%/Xeryon/Settings
- change SettingsFileDialog to begin search in above directory

item.title: Relay Box v1.3.0.4
item.description:
Product: Relay Box v1.3.0.4
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 26 Jul 2024 08:39:08 -0400
Packager: John Maier / Patrick Irvin

Description: Software to control resistor relay box

Release Notes: - this release calls the D2XX-LV library rather than D2XX directly
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: D2XX-LV v1.1.0.5
item.description:
Product: D2XX-LV v1.1.0.5
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 26 Jul 2024 08:06:27 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin / LevyLab

Description: This library provides an interface to FTDI's D2XX drivers that better follows LabVIEW programming norms.

Release Notes: - add FT_Set_Bit_Mode (Issue #1)
- add FT_Read/Write_EEPROM_User_Area (Issue #2)
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Relay Box v1.2.0.3
item.description:
Product: Relay Box v1.2.0.3
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 24 Jul 2024 17:34:53 -0400
Packager: John Maier / Patrick Irvin

Description: Software to control resistor relay box

Release Notes: - this release further disentagles the relay box code from the FTD2XX.dll wrapper code (by linking to a D2XX package instead of hosting internally)
- relay state is stored with EEPROM user area rather than in manufacturer string
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
